definition: to store up/to grow (e.g. a beard)/to entertain (ideas)

to amass/to accumulate/to store/measured quantity (such as area of volume)/product (the result of multiplication)/to integrate (math.)/to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.)/old/long-standing

sentences.english: However, the accumulative concentrations of DDT and BHC in 1998 was much higher than that of some foreign countries.
sentences.chinese: 但1998年的蓄积水平与国外相比仍处于较高水平。

sentences.english: Although mannitol can be absorbed by the gastrointestinal, but does not accumulate in the body.
sentences.chinese: 甘露醇虽可被人的胃肠所吸收，但在体内并不蓄积。

sentences.english: Consequently, women capable of bearing children tend not to accumulate excess fat on the belly.
sentences.chinese: 因此，女性的生育能力使得脂肪往往不会蓄积在腹部。

sentences.english: The non-porous layer holds the water in an area called the saturated zone.
sentences.chinese: 不渗透层将水蓄积在一个叫做“饱和层”的地方。

sentences.english: China's per-capita forest area and stocking volume lag far behind the worlds average level.
sentences.chinese: 中国人均森林面积和蓄积量都远低于世界平均水平。

sentences.english: In determining dosage regimens, it is also necessary to know the extent of drug accumulation.
sentences.chinese: 在决定剂量方案时，必须知道药物在体内蓄积的程度。

sentences.english: This represents the last uncontrolled reservoir of polio in the world.
sentences.chinese: 这形成全世界最后无法控制的脊髓灰质炎的蓄积地。

sentences.english: Rainwater and condensation collect in the box’s chamber, where water gets trapped.
sentences.chinese: 收集到的雨水和凝结水蓄积在箱体的内腔。

sentences.english: The men collected rain-water in the rubber dinghy.
sentences.chinese: 他们用橡皮艇蓄积雨水。

sentences.english: Cadmium is a heavy metal element with accumulation toxicity.
sentences.chinese: 镉是一种有毒的重金属元素，具有蓄积性毒性。

sentences.english: Reduction of AGE accumulation could a-meliorate wound healing delay due to diabetes.
sentences.chinese: 减少AGE蓄积，可改善糖尿病创面愈合延迟现象。

sentences.english: As a result of this defect, affected individuals accumulate high concentrations of plant sterols in plasma and tissues.
sentences.chinese: 因此，患者在血浆和组织中蓄积了高浓度的植物固醇。

sentences.english: Their hope was that, overwhelmed with pyruvate, the mitochondria would be forced to respond.
sentences.chinese: 希望，当丙酮酸蓄积时，线粒体就会被迫产生反应。

sentences.english: The nurse should remove previously applied topical medications before applying new medications to prevent accumulation of medication that exceeds the precribed dose.
sentences.chinese: 护士应该先除去残留的药物再涂药，避免药物蓄积。

sentences.english: The effects of guanethidine are cumulative over extended periods.
sentences.chinese: 胍乙啶的作用是蓄积性的，且可维持较长时间。

sentences.english: The highest annual volume growth is found in stands of middle density of stocking.
sentences.chinese: 中等密度的白桦林有着最高的年蓄积生长量。

definition: within the body/in vivo (vs in vitro)/internal to
hidden beneath the surface/buried and concealed
to release/to set free/to liberate (a prisoner)/to discharge
to pour into/perfusion (med.)/to concentrate one's attention on/to teach/to inculcate/to instill
to exhaust/to use up/to deplete/to drain
